sentences.en: Dive and snorkel sites are easily accessible by boat from the beach.
sentences.cn: 从海滩坐船就可以直接到达潜水和潜泳的场所,方便极了.

sentences.en: Swim off the side of the ship and snorkel in some of the clearest waters imaginable.
sentences.cn: 游离小船边，用呼吸管潜游到可以想像得到的一些最清澈的水域。

sentences.en: This is full stroke swimming with a front - mount snorkel.
sentences.cn: 这是戴呼吸管的完整划臂动作.

sentences.en: This is the best snorkel at that price.
sentences.cn: 这是那个价钱的呼吸管中最好的。

words.tran_cn: 用水下通气管潜航；用通气管潜泳（snorkel的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: （潜水者使用的）通气管，水下呼吸管
trans.tran_en: A snorkel is a tube through which a person swimming just under the surface of the sea can breathe.
When someone snorkels, they swim under water using a snorkel.
